IncliNET

Description

IncliNET is a Python application to determine the inclination of Spiral Galaxies

  • This application is hosted on EDD: IncliNET

  • EDD: Extragalactic Distance Database

Code Repository & Issues

https://github.com/ekourkchi/inclinet_deployment_repo

Basic Install

Execute

$ sh serverup.sh

Installing from DockerHub

API

$ curl https://edd.ifa.hawaii.edu/inclinet/api/pgc/2557
{
"status": "success",
"galaxy": {
    "pgc": "2557",
    "ra": "10.6848 deg",
    "dec": "41.2689 deg",
    "fov": "266.74 arcmin",
    "pa": "35.0 deg",
    "objname": "NGC0224"
},
"inclinations": {
    "Group_0": {
    "model4": 69.0,
    "model41": 72.0,
    "model42": 76.0,
    "model43": 71.0
    },
    "Group_1": {
    "model5": 73.0,
    "model51": 73.0,
    "model52": 74.0,
    "model53": 74.0
    },
    "Group_2": {
    "model6": 73.0,
    "model61": 76.0,
    "model62": 76.0,
    "model63": 67.0
    },
    "summary": {
    "mean": 72.83333333333333,
    "median": 73.0,
    "stdev": 2.6718699236468995
    }
},
"rejection_likelihood": {
    "model4-binary": 50.396937131881714,
    "model5-binary": 20.49814760684967,
    "model6-binary": 65.37048816680908,
    "summary": {
    "mean": 45.42185763518015,
    "median": 50.396937131881714,
    "stdev": 18.65378065042258
    }
}
}

For more information, read the tutorial in the documentation.

ABOUT THE DATA

All data exposed by the IncliNET project belongs to

Cosmicflows-4 program Copyright (C) Cosmicflows Team - The Extragalactic Distance Database (EDD)

Please cite:
